sentences.sContent: The topsoil has been almost completely washed away.
sentences.sContent_eng: The topsoil has been almost completely washed away.
sentences.sCn: 表层土壤已差不多完全给冲走了。

sentences.sContent: According to scientists, it takes nature 500 years to create an inch of topsoil.
sentences.sContent_eng: According to scientists, it takes nature 500 years to create an inch of topsoil.
sentences.sCn: 根据科学家们的看法，自然界要用500年的时间才能形成一英寸的表层土壤。

sentences.sContent: Straw mulching, cultivating and hoeing , regulating the root distribution in the topsoil are effective measures to reduce the soil evaporation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Straw mulching, cultivating and hoeing , regulating the root distribution in the topsoil are effective measures to reduce the soil evaporation.
sentences.sCn: 秸秆覆盖、中耕锄划、调控表层土壤根系分布等可作为减少土壤蒸发的有效措施。

remMethod.val: top(顶上的) + soil(土地) → 表层土

trans.tranOther: the upper level of soil in which most plants have their roots
